title: What is MBFT
content: MBFT (Mariners' Beyond Field Talks) is a fan-driven digital platform dedicated exclusively to Mohun Bagan Athletic Club. It focuses on Mohun Bagan news, match analysis, fan discussions, historical content, and community-driven conversations related to the club.

title: MBFT Purpose
content: The purpose of MBFT is to provide a trusted space for Mohun Bagan supporters to engage in informed discussions, share opinions responsibly, and preserve the legacy and heritage of the club through digital media.

title: Mohun Bagan Foundation
content: Mohun Bagan Athletic Club was founded in 1889 in Kolkata, India. It is one of the oldest football clubs in Asia and has a rich history in Indian football.

title: Mohun Bagan Historic Achievement
content: Mohun Bagan is famously known for winning the 1911 IFA Shield by defeating the East Yorkshire Regiment, a landmark moment in Indian football history.

title: Mohun Bagan Identity
content: Mohun Bagan Athletic Club is traditionally associated with green and maroon colours and is regarded as one of the most supported football clubs in India.

title: Mohun Bagan Squad Over the Years
content: MBFT documents Mohun Bagan squads across different eras, covering the clubâ€™s football squads from its early history in 1889 up to the modern era, including seasons up to 2026. This archive reflects how Mohun Bagan squads have evolved over time, highlighting the continuity, transitions, and historical importance of team compositions across decades.
